sentences.sContent: Prepare - Research what you want to sell using Completed Listings. Have credit card and bank information ready for verification.
sentences.sContent_eng: Prepare - Research what you want to sell using Completed Listings. Have credit card and bank information ready for verification.
sentences.sCn: 准备-通过调查已经发布的广告确认你究竟要卖什么，拥有供查证的信用卡和银行信息。

sentences.sContent: The General Dynamics-led team will provide training for hardware and software, and also furnish independent verification and validation of sensors and systems.
sentences.sContent_eng: The General Dynamics-led team will provide training for hardware and software, and also furnish independent verification and validation of sensors and systems.
sentences.sCn: 通用动力公司领导的团队将提供硬件和软件训练，也将提供传感器和系统的独立查证和确认。

phrases.pCn: 存货核实证明书；检定证书；验单
